news.title: Students learn astrophysics through mixed-reality computer simulation
news.summary: Had the "learn'd astronomer's" charts and theorems inspired the 19th century writer Walt Whitman as much as strolling under the nighttime sky, Whitman might have become an astrophysicist instead of a stargazing poet.

news.title: Seventh-graders learn astrophysics through mixed-reality computer simulation
news.summary: CHAMPAIGN, Ill. -- Had the "learn'd astronomer's" charts and theorems inspired the 19th century writer Walt Whitman as much as strolling under the nighttime sky, Whitman might have become an astrophysicist instead of a stargazing poet.

blogs.title: STEM Stories – Kids Learn Astrophysics With Mixed-Reality
blogs.summary:
Mixed-reality technology could inspire greater numbers of young people to become astronomers and scientists
Researchers at the University of Illinois are using a new computer simulation to inspire greater numbers of young people to become astronomers &ndas
